nodes.text: The Posenaur was a species of lizard native to the planet Dagobah. They only had two legs.

Posenaurs were a type of vicious lizard native to the planet Dagobah. Prowling the few dry spots on the planet, these creatures ran on their only two legs, and stood around one meter tall. They also had webbed feet that allowed them to cross small areas of water and patches of boggy land.
Posenaurs were pack hunters, and while they mostly ate rodents and other small prey, a large enough group could take down prey many times their size, using their powerful jaws and razor-sharp teeth.
